author: newsr.in
title: Amy Schumer Tears Up on The Today Show, Talks Body Image - Video
text: If you look around Hollywood, there are not many women with Amy Schumer’s figure or, for that matter, the guts to point that out in public. The entertainment industry is obsessed with thinness, which, for women, has come to equal “perfection.” While she’s usually laughing about it, Amy does have moments when it gets to her and makes her not want to continue doing the work she loves so much, she admits in a new interview with The Today Show’s special correspondent Maria Shri... »
